recipesJson.name: Anneliese
recipesJson.author: Borninfire138
recipesJson.description: A delicious, thick creamy whipped strawberry cream in yo mouth. Get some.

reviews.text: I love this! Pretty good shake & Vape, but after 1 week & beyond.......OMG good! Thanks

This was a nice change from the bavarian cream and cookie-heavy strawberry recipes.  I had to sub FA Strawberry for the Shisha so I won't comment on the strawberry flavor, but the cream base gave a nice mouthfeel without taking away from the vibrancy of the strawberry layer, as it should be.
